scripts.test_dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run end-to-end
scripts.test_qa_smoke: cross-env NODE_ENV=qa NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run smoke
scripts.test_qa: cross-env NODE_ENV=qa NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run end-to-end
scripts.test_qa_us: cross-env NODE_ENV=qa_us NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run test_us_region
scripts.test_qa_au: cross-env NODE_ENV=qa_au NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run test_au_region
scripts.test_qa_eu: cross-env NODE_ENV=qa_eu NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run test_eu_region
scripts.test_qa_ca: cross-env NODE_ENV=qa_ca NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run test_ca_region
scripts.test_qa_regression: cross-env NODE_ENV=qa NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run regression
scripts.test_sso_dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run sso
scripts.test_sso_qa: cross-env NODE_ENV=qa NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run sso
scripts.test_sso_prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run sso
scripts.test_prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npm run end-to-end
scripts.docker-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=qa NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0  mocha --recursive --timeout 999999 --fgrep *docker-test* --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./reports/file.xml
